text: Joseph and the Amazing Technicolor Dreamcoat is a musical. It is based on a story from the Bible. The title character is Joseph, one of the twelve sons of the patriarch Jacob. The lyrics were written by Tim Rice. The music was written by Andrew Lloyd Webber. It was first performed in England, on the West End in 1970, and in the USA on Broadway, New York City, in 1982. Category:1970s musicals Category:Musicals by Tim Rice Category:Musicals by Andrew Lloyd Webber Category:1970 works
title: Joseph and the Amazing Technicolor Dreamcoat
